statements: DELETE FROM gps_data WHERE device_id = 'ABC123' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND latitude = 40.7128 AND longitude = -74.0060;
DELETE FROM gps_data WHERE device_id = 'ABCD1234' AND latitude > 40.0;
DELETE FROM locations WHERE location_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' AND model = 'iPhone'
DELETE FROM location_logs WHERE trigger_event = 'exit' AND trigger_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE device_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
